mapper.insert: insert into product (id, sub_category_id, store_id, name, price, description, discount_rate, discount_price, thumbnail_image_path, thumbnail_image_name, thumbnail_image_url) values ( #{id}, #{subCategoryId}, #{storeId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{discountRate}, #{discountPrice}, #{thumbnailImagePath}, #{thumbnailImageName} #{thumbnailImageUrl} )
insert into product_option (id, product_id, description, add_price) values ( #{id}, #{productId}, #{description}, #{addPrice} )
insert into product_image (id, product_id, product_image_path, product_image_name, product_image_url) values ( #{id}, #{productId}, #{productImagePath}, #{productImageName}, #{productImageUrl} )
